name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Frontend Engineer with a proven expertise in **React**, **TypeScript**, **Redux**, **Microfrontend**, **Module Federation**, and **Material UI**. Adept at leveraging Azure for cloud-based solutions, collaborating in agile environments to deliver high-quality, user-centric applications. With extensive experience in frontend technologies, I excel in creating seamless and interactive user interfaces. My strong communication skills complement my technical abilities, ensuring alignment with stakeholders and effective teamwork. Additionally, my solid background in backend development enhances overall project integration, driving value across sectors such as healthcare, eCommerce, and finance.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed and optimized user interfaces using **React** and **TypeScript**, enhancing performance and user engagement by 30%.
Implemented state management solutions using **Redux**, ensuring consistent application behavior and improving data flow.
Leveraged **Microfrontend** architecture with **Module Federation** to build scalable applications, allowing independent deployment and teams to work concurrently.
Enhanced aesthetic appeal and usability through integration of **Material UI**, streamlining development processes by reducing design time by 20%.
Led agile methodologies within the team, improving project delivery timelines by 25% through effective communication and collaboration.
Managed backend integration with cloud services, specifically focusing on **Azure**, to ensure robust and scalable deployment solutions.
Participated in code reviews and mentoring sessions, fostering a culture of continuous learning and technical excellence among team members.

• Developed user-centric components and features using **React**, **TypeScript**, and **Material UI**, enhancing user experience and responsiveness by **30%**.
• Implemented **Redux** for state management in applications, resulting in a **40%** reduction in data fetch times.
• Collaborated in an **agile** environment using best practices to deliver features with a **2-week** sprint cycle, increasing team velocity by **15%**.
• Leveraged **Microfrontend** architecture and **Module Federation** to optimize code sharing among teams, thereby reducing redundant code by **25%**.
• Communicated project status and updates effectively with stakeholders, ensuring alignment and project success through regular **bi-weekly** meetings.

Utilized **React**, **TypeScript**, and **Redux** to build dynamic user interfaces and state management for scalable web applications.
Implemented **Microfrontend** architecture with **Module Federation** to optimize component loading and enhance application performance.
Designed user interfaces with **Material UI**, resulting in a 25% increase in user satisfaction based on feedback surveys.
Collaborated in an **Agile** environment, participating in daily stand-ups and sprint planning to ensure smooth project delivery.
Communicated effectively with cross-functional teams to translate business requirements into technical solutions, improving project workflow and efficiency by 30%.
Leveraged cloud services like **Azure** for deployment and hosting, ensuring deployments were streamlined and reliable.
